doc-title: Writ of Habeas Corpus for Gregory-Alan: Williams
doc-use-trigger: Trustee is arrested, detained, or obstructed from acting in his private or trust capacity under color of law.
doc-instructions: Print 2 copies. File with Clerk of Court and Sheriff
doc-filer: Partner Sonia, any next friend, or Successor Trustee

doc-title: Demand for Emergency Relief - Unlawful Conversion of Trust Property
doc-use-trigger: If any party attempts to convert, foreclose, repossess, or encumber trust property without verified authority or rebuttal of perfected claim.
doc-instructions: Deliver to Clerk of Court, Sheriff, creditor, or enforcement agent attempting to take trust property.

doc-title: Demand for Emergency Relief - Unlawful Seizure of Trust Vehicle
doc-use-trigger: When a vehicle or movable trust asset is at risk of seizure or conversion by any public or corporate actor.
doc-instructions: Deliver to any party attempting to seize, tow, or impound a trust vehicle. Keep notarized copy in vehicle at all times.
doc-filer: Trustee, partner, or authorized next friend
